001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticUtility;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
005
006/**
007 * Static factory methods for creating and configuring common
008 * {@link Regime} strategies.
009 * <p>
010 * This utility class provides convenient shortcuts to construct
011 * standard training regimes such as full-batch, mini-batch, or
012 * online training, as well as builders for chained regimes with
013 * additional behaviors (e.g., multiple epochs, reporting, or
014 * dumping neuron states).
015 */
016@StaticUtility
017public final class Regimes {
018
019    private Regimes() {
020    }
021
022    public static OneShotRegime oneShot() {
023        return new OneShotRegime();
024    }
025
026    /**
027     * Creates a full-batch training regime that processes the entire dataset
028     * in a single update.
029     *
030     * @return a new {@link BatchRegime}
031     */
032    public static BatchRegime batch() {
033        return new BatchRegime();
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * Creates a mini-batch training regime with the given batch size.
038     *
039     * @param batchSize the number of samples per mini-batch (must be &gt; 0)
040     * @return a new {@link MiniBatchRegime}
041     */
042    public static MiniBatchRegime miniBatch(int batchSize) {
043        return new MiniBatchRegime(batchSize);
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * Creates an online training regime that processes one sample at a time.
048     *
049     * @return a new {@link StochasticRegime}
050     */
051    public static StochasticRegime online() {
052        return new StochasticRegime();
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * Creates an online training regime that processes one sample at a time.
057     *
058     * @return a new {@link StochasticRegime}
059     */
060    public static StochasticRegime stochastic() {
061        return new StochasticRegime();
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Starts building a chained regime that repeats training for a given
066     * number of epochs.
067     *
068     * @param epochs the number of epochs (must be &gt; 0)
069     * @return a {@link ChainedRegime.Builder} preconfigured with epoch count
070     */
071    public static ChainedRegime.Builder epochs(int epochs) {
072        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().epochs(epochs);
073    }
074
075    public static ChainedRegime.Builder epochs(int epochs, EpochRegime.EpochCompletionListener... listener) {
076        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().epochs(epochs, listener);
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Starts building a chained regime that reports the objective function
081     * after training.
082     *
083     * @return a {@link ChainedRegime.Builder} preconfigured to report the objective
084     */
085    public static ChainedRegime.Builder reportObjective() {
086        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().reportObjective();
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Starts building a chained regime that dumps neuron states after training.
091     *
092     * @return a {@link ChainedRegime.Builder} preconfigured to dump nodes
093     */
094    public static ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes() {
095        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().dumpNodes();
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * Starts building a chained regime that dumps neuron states, optionally
100     * only during the first pass.
101     *
102     * @param firstTime if {@code true}, dump nodes only once
103     * @return a {@link ChainedRegime.Builder} preconfigured to dump nodes
104     */
105    public static ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes(boolean firstTime) {
106        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().dumpNodes(firstTime);
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Starts building a chained regime that dumps neuron states, optionally
111     * only during the first pass and optionally including input neurons.
112     *
113     * @param firstTime     if {@code true}, dump nodes only once
114     * @param includeInputs if {@code true}, include input nodes in the dump
115     * @return a {@link ChainedRegime.Builder} preconfigured to dump nodes
116     */
117    public static ChainedRegime.Builder dumpNodes(boolean firstTime, boolean includeInputs) {
118        return new ChainedRegime.Builder().dumpNodes(firstTime, includeInputs);
119    }
120
121}
